Class Review

java.lang.Object
application.Review
public class Review extends Object
Represents a review posted by a reviewer for a particular answer. A review may also be a reply to another review.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Review(int id, String content, User reviewer, Answer answer, Review originalReview)
    Constructs a Review object with the specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Review

      public Review(int id, String content, User reviewer, Answer answer, Review originalReview)
      Constructs a Review object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the review
      content - The content of the review
      reviewer - The user who posted the review
      answer - The answer that is being reviewed
      originalReview - The original review, if this is a reply to another review

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique identifier of the review.
      Returns:
      The id of the review

    • getContent

      public String getContent()
      Gets the content of the review.
      Returns:
      The content of the review

    • getReviewer

      public User getReviewer()
      Gets the reviewer who posted the review.
      Returns:
      The reviewer who posted the review

    • getAnswer

      public Answer getAnswer()
      Gets the answer that is being reviewed.
      Returns:
      The answer that is being reviewed

    • getOriginalReview

      public Review getOriginalReview()
      Gets the original review if this review is a reply to another review.
      Returns:
      The original review, or null if this review is not a reply

    • setContent

      public void setContent(String content)
      Sets the content of the review.
      Parameters:
      content - The new content for the review
